text:
That's the stage director's instruction.
I think there will be explanations during rehearsal.

Is that...
really necessary for the performance?

...? Is something wrong?
Maybe it's too high...

No, it's okay.
It's just that...

A lifter is just an up-and-down movement, right?
It feels like a waste of time just standing there.
Especially when there are dancers involved...

When lifted,
it's hard to maintain eye contact with the audience...

I see... I think it's a direction to ensure that the people
on stage can face the audience at the same eye level.

...Understood. If that's the decision,
then I'll do my best within that framework.

Ah...
Um... Of course, I'll do it!

Okay, I'll let the stage director know.
Let's polish up what we're good at as much as possible.

Yeah...
I want to do everything I can.

...Alright, sorry for the sudden change,
but I'm counting on both of you.
